Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory211.png'}
{3: '05:30 p.m. Inside the transport craft.'}
{3: 'After making sure that no reinforcement is coming, Alpha returns to the pilot seat in the transport craft.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Alpha', 3: "This transport craft doesn't have an official ID...?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Alpha was hoping to remove the dispatching center\'s tracking on the transport craft first, but she was surprised to find it "undocumented."'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'Not only is it unregistered, but its flight log is empty as well.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'Is this squad really the Purifying Force?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She takes the terminal from the one who looks like the captain and starts inspecting it.'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'Is this their mission data?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Alpha taps open the mission briefing on the terminal.'}
{3: 'If they are only pretending to be the Purifying Force, perhaps their mission will reveal the truth.'}
{3: 'The mission briefing lists the names of a few deserters and the last locations they were seen.'}
{3: 'It appears that they are here to search for deserters, which is what they are supposed to do.'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: "Something isn't right...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Remembering what she observed earlier and her past encounters with the Purifying Force, Alpha senses that something is out of place.'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'They seemed to be waiting instead of searching...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Alpha keeps examining the terminal, trying to recover deleted files.'}
{3: 'As expected, an encrypted mail appears before her.'}
{3: 'She opens it and finds the detailed information of a Construct.'}
{2: 'Channel Noise', 3: 'It seems that they will always be watching "you."'}
{1: 'Mission Target—Lucia: Plume (M.I.N.D. ID: BPL-01)', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Mission: 1. Arrive in Area D12 before 17:00 GMT and secure the transport craft.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1'}

{1: '2. Wolfsbane should head to Area D12 to confirm the status of the target at 17:30 GMT after completing Mission 1 and await further instruction.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1', 9: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Alpha', 3: 'What do they want her for? No... More importantly, what were they waiting for?', 4: '1'}
{3: "Although she has not come into contact with Gray Raven, Alpha's instinct tells her that a hidden thread is slowly forming a net."}
{3: 'This net is gradually tightening, gathering up unrelated parties.'}
{2: 'Channel Noise', 3: 'Do you want to warn her? Perhaps seeing her will clear up the doubts in your heart.'}
{3: 'Hearing the noise in her audio module, Alpha eventually shakes her head.'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: "There's no reason for me to risk my life for her. It doesn't help what I'm about to do either.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Channel Noise', 3: "She probably would have fallen into these people's hands by now if it weren't for your intervention."}
{2: 'Channel Noise', 3: "I thought you didn't want what happened to you to happen to her. Or do you think the person who provided you with this intel will continue to help Gray Raven?"}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: "I interfered in City 075 because the Gray Raven Commandant might have information on Luna's whereabouts. It was more advantageous for me that they were alive back then.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Channel Noise', 3: "Is it more advantageous for you right now if they're in trouble?"}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: "What's happening to them doesn't really impact me. However, it has revealed some useful information.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'The Parliament shaped them into "heroes." Now, someone is going after them.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Alpha sneers and closes the projection before her.'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'How familiar... Obviously, Kurono is behind these people.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: "Whether it's the Parliament losing its hold on the situation or those working in the shadows finding a weak point they can target...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'It shows that humans are pointing their guns toward each other, which will only make things easier for me.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: "And the person who told me about this place couldn't be aiding Gray Raven.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: "She wouldn't have sought the Ascendants' help otherwise.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Alpha crushes the terminal in her hand before entering the coordinates in her mind into the navigation system.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory318.png'}
{3: 'Your pistol lands accurately at the energy core of the Corrupted.'}
{3: 'Its bright red eyes dim, and the clattering of metal dies down.'}
{2: 'This is the last one.', 3: '66'}
{3: 'You are all relieved that you have not encountered any Ascendant on your way to the new conservation while escorting the transport fleet.'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Changyu', 3: "What a lovely experience working together this has been. I must admit that Babylonia's generosity has surprised me. Remember that we're always open for business on your future ventures.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "It's gonna cost a lot to restart the Eternal Engine, after all.", 4: '1'}
{3: "After parting with ACA's Cargo Crew, Gray Raven—Lucia and you, more specifically—receives another mission to eliminate more Corrupted."}
{3: 'Although their numbers have greatly diminished, occasional groups of Corrupted still appear outside the Clean Zone.'}
{3: 'Lucia is responsible for taking down most of them, and you do your best to eliminate separated Corrupted before they near the temporary camps.'}
{3: 'Confirming that there are no moving Corrupted nearby, you turn the safety of your still-scorching pistol back on and holster it.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Commandant! Are you hurt?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lucia still steps up and gives you a detailed inspection before she relaxes and smiles.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Good. You're not hurt.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "I've eliminated the Corrupted in the southwestern directions as well. I'm not detecting more movement currently.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Should we patrol the other directions now, Commandant?', 4: '1'}
{3: "That is when you notice a cut on Lucia's right arm where vital fluid is dripping out, soaking her clothes."}
{2: 'Are you hurt?', 3: '86'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "It's just a small injury. It won't affect me.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lucia is not wrong. Small injuries like that are run-of-the-mill to her.'}
{3: 'What bothers you more is...'}
{2: 'How did you get hurt?', 3: '90'}
{3: 'These shambling Corrupted should not have posed any threat to Lucia.'}
{2: 'Was it the M.I.N.D. trance again?', 3: '92'}
{3: 'Her situation seems to be worse than you imagined, but what caused it...?'}
{3: 'As you deliberate the possible reasons, you suddenly hear a sharp shriek—the alarm for highly concentrated Punishing Virus.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: 'You try to warn Lucia when she pushes you away.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab', 2: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab'}
{3: 'The unexpected force sends you crashing into a steel plate several meters away.'}
{3: 'Dazed by the impact, you barely even hear the deafening alarm anymore.'}
{3: 'You lean on the metal plate to stand up, struggling to recover your blurred vision.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryGanRanNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia!'}
{3: 'You thought the alarm was caused by Corrupted hidden underground, but it is actually coming from Lucia.'}
{3: 'She covers her forehead, her expression filled with agony. Her thruster is thrown aside as dull red sparks flash around her body.'}
{3: 'You can see with your own eyes that she has been infected significantly. Her Inver-Device is not enough to stabilize her M.I.N.D, and she requires an immediate M.I.N.D. connection.'}
{2: '(Establish connection)', 3: '120'}
{3: 'Lucia suddenly shouts to warn you as if she has noticed something, but she is too late.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryGanRanNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiSHanshuoNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg3002_39.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiHuaping.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiHuaping.prefab'}
{3: 'The sense of suffocation fills your brain. Your heart feels like it is being torn to pieces by a pair of hands. Chaos takes over your mind as if a swamp is devouring your sanity.'}
{2: '(The Mind Beacon is infected...)', 3: '142'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiHuaping.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory425.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory445.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory446.jpg'}
{3: 'You feel like you are back under City 075, and time is stretched infinitely.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiHuaping.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'In this unending moment, you sense a clear emotion amidst the sea of chaos...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory318.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryGanRanNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{3: 'Hostility.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg3002_03.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '0.5', 5: '0.5'}
{3: 'Blinded by an illusory redness, you feel a sudden sharp pain in your abdomen and then the contrasting feeling of coldness and heat.'}
{3: 'Blood and vital fluid drips down the blade from the palms of you two onto the floor.'}
{3: 'Your momentary instinct saved you from a strike to your vital organs. Grabbing the katana with your hands, you have avoided the worst outcome.'}
{3: 'But you alone could never dodge a strike from a Construct.'}
{3: "Holding the hilt of her blade with one hand, Lucia's other hand, however, is clutching the blade like you."}
{3: 'Strife, fear, hatred, disgust, regrets... Complicated emotions flash across her face as if a demon is fighting to control her body.'}
{3: 'Like pushing an avalanche back onto the mountain top while steeping in a swamp, you calm down the chaotic M.I.N.D. while slowly pulling the katana out from your abdomen.'}
{2: "Don't lose to it...", 3: '174'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Commandant!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryGanRanNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg3002_03.jpg', 3: '0.5', 4: '1', 5: '2'}
{3: 'Blood gushes out of your wound.'}
{3: 'And you hear a cry of anguish you have never heard before.'}
